signin_note.title: Let's spread your wisdom by signing in to chienowa
signin_note.description: Once you sign in, you can share your wisdom to beginners. And you might be awarded accordingly.

signup.signup_with_username: Sign in with user name and password
signup.input_your_password: From 6 to 16 characters, Only half-width can be used
signup.username_more_than_6: User name must be more than 6 characters
signup.username_less_than_16: User name must be less than 16 characters
signup.password_more_than_6: Password must be more than 6 characters
signup.password_less_than_16: Password must be less than 16 characters
signup.password_illegal: You can't user 2 byte characters for password
signup.not_notified: Even if you use SNS account, nothing will be notified to your friend.

signup_note.description1: We believe you would have knowledge for certain area. For instance, cooking, music sports... We think such knowlege would help out beginners since they don't know how and what they should do at the beginning. How about help out such beginners?
signup_note.title2: What happens if I join chienowa?
signup_note.description2: If you join the chienowa, As a export for some area, you would be able to share and spread your knowledge and wisdom to beginners!

contact.overview: We are always welcome to your comments and messages.
contact.name: Name
contact.successfully_sent: Thank you for sending out your message. Your message is successfully sent out to us.
contact.send_failed: Failed to send mesage. And please try again later

wisdom.join: How about join to chienowa and spread your wisdom and help out beginners all over the world?
wisdom.wisdom_update_desc_no_user: If you join chienowa from below button, you can get point and join ranking. Join us!
wisdom.like_failed: Error occured. Please try again later

newwisdom.title: Title
newwisdom.tag_description: Addtional keyword that shall support category and subcategory. (For instance: Category: Music and Sub category: Piano. And the tag would be Jazz)
newwisdom.title_help: 35 characters or less is recommended. Maximum 50 characters
newwisdom.description_help: 150 characters or less is recommended. Maximum 500 characters
newwisdom.howto_category_desc: Select suitable category and subcategory that you are about to create page
newwisdom.howto_summary_desc: Come up with easy to understand title. It would be good to use concreate keywords
newwisdom.howto_tag_desc: Additional one word for Category and Sub category. For instance, put 'Jazz' for Category 'Music' and Sub category 'Piano'. Easy to understand keyword is better.
newwisdom.howto_thumbnail_desc: Select eye catch image for your page
newwisdom.howto_overview_desc: Overview explanation for your page. It would be good if you can add information explaining about 'To whom' and 'What content'
newwisdom.howto_headline_desc: Optional item. Please add depends on contents you are about to create. For this item, you can add more than two.
newwisdom.howto_description_desc: Optional item. Please add depends on contents you are about to create. For this item, you can add more than two
